resources.string: Welcome to RemindMeDo. The app that reminds you to complete tasks based on your current location. Yes it\'s that simple
We recommend you use Google services to sign up as it is very likely they already collect key information to allow this app to work
If you would prefer to sign up manually fill out the form below!
You agree to the Terms and Conditions
resources.string-array: You Agree to the Terms and Conditions You are aware that this applications uses your current geographical location at any given time
